name: BulkRequest
description: schema representation of a bulk request

attributes.name: failOnErrors
attributes.description: An integer specifying the number of errors that the service provider will accept before the operation is terminated and an error response is returned. OPTIONAL in a request. Not valid in a response.

attributes.name: Operations
attributes.description: Defines operations within a bulk job. Each operation corresponds to a single HTTP request against a resource endpoint. REQUIRED.

subAttributes.name: method
subAttributes.description: The HTTP method of the current operation.  Possible values are 'POST', 'PUT', 'PATCH', or 'DELETE'.  REQUIRED.

subAttributes.name: bulkId
subAttributes.description: The transient identifier of a newly created resource, unique within a bulk request and created by the client. The bulkId serves as a surrogate resource id enabling clients to uniquely identify newly created resources in the response and cross-reference new resources in and across operations within a bulk request.  REQUIRED when "method" is "POST".

subAttributes.name: path
subAttributes.description: The resource's relative path to the SCIM service provider's root.If "method" is "POST", the value must specify a resource type endpoint, e.g., /Users or /Groups, whereas all other "method" values must specify the path to a specific resource, e.g., /Users/2819c223-7f76-453a-919d-413861904646.REQUIRED in a request.

subAttributes.name: data
subAttributes.description: The resource data as it would appear for a single SCIM POST, PUT, or PATCH operation. REQUIRED in a request when "method" is "POST", "PUT", or "PATCH".

subAttributes.name: version
subAttributes.description: The current resource version. Version MAY be used if the service provider supports entity-tags (ETags) (Section 2.3 of [RFC7232]) and "method" is "PUT", "PATCH", or "DELETE".
